message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can call it a day!
You were too generous, now it's my turn to be generous
You said you were generous, but I'm not convinced. This is my next offer.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about dividing the money fairly
I'm starting to think you're not serious about dividing the money fairly... I'll give you a bit more, but don't get too comfortable.
You're not giving me enough, I'm starting to think I should take it all
I'm not afraid of you taking it all, but I'm willing to compromise. This is my next offer.
You're getting desperate, I can smell it. This is my final offer
I'm not going down without a fight. This is my last offer, take it or leave it.
